title: Consolidate LTL Shipments into a Multi-Stop FTL
description: A planner has several LTL shipments going to the same region and wants to consolidate them into a more cost-effective multi-stop full truckload.

tasks.description: Identify all pending LTL shipments going to a specific region (e.g., the Southeast).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of 5 LTL shipments.

tasks.description: Use a load planning tool to see if the shipments can fit on one truck and calculate the potential cost savings.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tool confirms the shipments can be consolidated, saving 20% on freight costs.

tasks.description: Create a new multi-stop FTL shipment and assign the LTL orders to it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the consolidated load and links the original orders.
